subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Titans defensive end Jevon Kearse was arrested and charged with driving under the influence after a traffic stop near the Vanderbilt campus in Nashville. The Vanderbilt spokesman Jim Patterson said Kearse was stopped early Sunday morning after the campus police reported seeing the S.U.V. that Kearse was driving weaving across the road. Patterson says Kearse took a field sobriety test, but refused a breathalyzer. He was arrested and charged with D.U.I. and a violation of Tennessee’s implied consent law for failing to take the breathalyzer test.
